titlestmt.titleproper: Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers Files, Presidents' Office
A Guide to the Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers Files, Presidents' Office FA1827

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-11-01 04:27:23 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers Files, Presidents' Office

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to RAC in 2016 and 2017 by the SSRC and ingested by RAC as Accessions 2016:003, 2016:007, 2016:009, 2016:010, 2016:074, 2017:018, and 2017:022.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains the files of the following SSRC presidents: Kenneth Prewitt (1995–1998), David Featherman (1989–1995), Frederic Wakeman, Jr. (1986–1989), Francis X. Sutton (Acting President, 1985–1986), and Kenneth Prewitt (1979–1985).

The collection consists of general SSRC office files, board meeting materials, SSRC committee project correspondence, correspondence and reports from grantmaking organizations regarding grants to the SSRC, general correspondence with foundations, SSRC President David Featherman's office files and trip files, files relating to the work of SSRC commiittees, executive committee meeting materials, and David Featherman's and Frederic Wakeman, Jr.'s chronological files.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains SSRC staff meeting materials, Board of Directors meeting materials, Items (SSRC newsletters), memos and correspondence, and financial documents.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence with outside organizations, including foundations, government entities, and other nonprofits. Correspondence pertains to the work of SSRC committees, grants to the SSRC, research interests, and conferences. The series also contains articles and publications, congressional testimony, meeting materials, project proposals, and grant reports, and grant applications.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: David Featherman served as president of the SSRC from 1989-1995. His files consist of correspondence with foundations and nonprofit organizations, research materials, trip files, grant and project proposals, meeting materials, articles, and SSRC workshop files. Some files may contain correspondence and other documents of Stanley Heginbotham, Vice President of the SSRC during David Featherman's tenure.
